Index.title: Find a home for your food scraps, wherever you are
Index.subtitle: Peels connects folks with food scraps to those who compost. It’s a free, non-commercial, community project.

howItWorks.title: Here’s how it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Sharing food scraps with neighbours, community gardens, or even local businesses is easy. Here’s how.

newsletter.title: What’s new
newsletter.subtitle: Occasional updates on how Peels is supporting community composting around the world.
newsletter.footer: Check out our <page>Newsletter</page> page for all past issues and how to subscribe.

faq.title: You might be wondering...
faq.subtitle: Doesn’t this already exist? What’s your mission? You’ve got questions, we’ve (hopefully) got answers.
faq.footer: Head to our <page>Support</page> page if you have more questions.

body.thanks: Thanks for signing up{name, select, empty {} other {, {name}}}! Please check your inbox and spam for a verification link. This link will expire in an hour from now.
